name: OmniDexOracleV2
description: OmniDexOracleV2. Proxy smart contract to get the price of an asset from a price source, with DIA oracle smart contracts as primary option - If the returned price by DIA is <= 0, or price is older than maxPriceAgeLimit the call is forwarded to a fallbackOracle - Owned by the OmniDex governance system, allowed to add keys for assets, replace them, change master oracle and change the fallbackOracle.

eventDecorators.name: AssetKeyUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: BaseCurrencySet
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: DIAOracleUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: FallbackOracleUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetPrice
functionDecorators.description: Gets an asset price by address.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetsPrices
functionDecorators.description: Gets a list of prices from a list of assets addresses.

functionDecorators.name: getFallbackOracle
functionDecorators.description: Gets the address of the fallback oracle.

returnDecorators.description: address The addres of the fallback oracle.

functionDecorators.name: getMasterOracle
functionDecorators.description: Gets the address of the master oracle.

returnDecorators.description: address The addres of the DIA oracle.

functionDecorators.name: getMaxPriceAgeLimit
functionDecorators.description: Gets the maximum age that the oracle price can be before the call is routed to fallback.

functionDecorators.name: getSourceOfAsset
functionDecorators.description: Gets the DIA key for an asset address.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setAssetKey
functionDecorators.description: External function called by the OmniDex governance to set or replace DIA keys for assets.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the asset to be set.

parameterDecorators.name: key
parameterDecorators.description: The DIA keys/symbol of the source of each asset.

functionDecorators.name: setDIAOracle
functionDecorators.description: Sets the MasterOracle - Callable only by the OmniDex governance.

functionDecorators.name: setFallbackOracle
functionDecorators.description: Sets the fallbackOracle - Callable only by the OmniDex governance.

functionDecorators.name: setMaxPriceAgeLimit
functionDecorators.description: Sets the max age that an oracle price can be before fallback oracle is called - Callable only by the OmniDex governance.

parameterDecorators.name: AgeLimit
parameterDecorators.description: max age in seconds of latest price.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
